testcase.name: Parse sample Jacoco XML Report correctly
When multiple rules fire, then the one with smaller threshold dominates
Coverage thresholds are inclusive lower bound
Rules have no effect on coverage types and classes that they don't apply to
A more specific rule with a higher threshold does not overrule a less specific one with smaller threshold
A more specific rule with a lower threshold overrules a less specific one with higher threshold
Whitelisted files are exempt from coverage requirements
Thresholds can be set for any scope
Thresholds can be defined for all scopes at once
